name: Lab Out Loud Podcast
what_you_do: Lab Out Loud is a podcast that shares insights and discussions related to science education and teaching practices.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves educators, science enthusiasts, and anyone interested in science education, primarily targeting B2C audiences.
